textContent:
- I am learning share many of the same ideas and interests in viroqua area projects 
- speaking with her I feel understood and seen
- I have a desire to work together bc I can see a lot of synergy that makes good friendships and business partnership  
- but I know feeling understood, as well as entering into spaces of creative collaboration, enter into a realm where feelings of attraction can manifest. I've noticed these feelings coming up. 
- I hold sacred our relationship and I wanted you to know what's been coming up for me. I also need your help on figure out the right path for us. 
- my commitment is to you. This means loving all of you,  prioritizing you above others, and holding scared for you alone my intimate spiritual, emotional and physical self. 
- this means I will share this with you and continue to reinforce my commitment that those feelings will not be acted upon in a way that will hurt us. I also intend to ensure they arent acted on in any way that hurts you..
- so my ask for help is what do you need from me to feel seen, secure and confident in our relationship? From stopping everything to what other end?
    - what communication? 
    - what activity? 
    - what feedback 
    - what space?
title: Trust & Commitment
textContentHtml:
- I am learning share many of the same ideas and interests in viroqua area projects 

- speaking with her I feel understood and seen

- I have a desire to work together bc I can see a lot of synergy that makes good friendships and business partnership  

- but I know feeling understood, as well as entering into spaces of creative collaboration, enter into a realm where feelings of attraction can manifest. I've noticed these feelings coming up. 

- I hold sacred our relationship and I wanted you to know what's been coming up for me. I also need your help on figure out the right path for us. 

- my commitment is to you. This means loving all of you,  prioritizing you above others, and holding scared for you alone my intimate spiritual, emotional and physical self. 

- this means I will share this with you and continue to reinforce my commitment that those feelings will not be acted upon in a way that will hurt us. I also intend to ensure they arent acted on in any way that hurts you..

- so my ask for help is what do you need from me to feel seen, secure and confident in our relationship? From stopping everything to what other end?

    - what communication? 

    - what activity? 

    - what feedback 

    - what space?
